User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Habitual application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Habit.title: Habit
Habit.description: Represents a habit being tracked by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the habit entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this habit.

description.description: A more detailed description of the habit.

frequency.description: The frequency with which the habit should be performed (e.g., daily, weekly).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the habit was created.

isActive.description: A boolean indicating whether the habit is currently active.

HabitLog.title: HabitLog
HabitLog.description: Represents a log of a user's habit completion on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the habit log entry.

habitId.description: Reference to the Habit being logged.

userId.description: Reference to the User who performed the habit.

date.description: The date on which the habit was logged (YYYY-MM-DD).

completed.description: A boolean indicating whether the habit was completed on the given date.

definition.description: Stores habits owned by a specific user.
Stores completion logs for the user's habits.
